title: How do I get my phone to quite having the "Display over others..." pop up every 10 seconds?
content: Every few seconds a screen interrupts what I am looking at.  The screen says "Display over other...".  I have rebooted the phone twice and it is still happening.  The Verizon store said it's not a phone issue but a google issue.  I have a Pixel 2XL and I see it's not even listed as a device option.
